    • Constructor Detail

      • DroG

        public DroG()

      • DroG

        public DroG(int edgeXY,
    short gaussianKernelSize,
    float gaussianSigma,
    int threshold)
        Parameters:
        edgeXY - Choose 0 if you want to detect vertical edges or 1 if you want to detect horizontal edges, default = 0 (X-Edge)
        gaussianKernelSize - the size of the gaussian kernel, has to be an odd number, default 3
        gaussianSigma - Gaussian Sigma, has to be greater than 0 and positive, default 0.5
        threshold - Threshold number from 0-255, default 20

      • run

        public void run(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip)
        Description copied from interface: Descriptor
        Start processing of this algorithm on the given image processor. Keep in mind that if the imageProcessor is changed, Supports.NoChanges must not be set. This is also the case even if only ImageProcessor.snapshot() is used.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Descriptor

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: Descriptor
        Adds a change listener to this descriptor. The descriptor might fire status change events which can be used to track the progress. Keep in mind that no implementation is forced to fire any events at all.
        Specified by:
        addPropertyChangeListener in interface Descriptor
